TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Kawbu’, title = Kawbu’, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kawbu’} }

S.FORM: alang Kawbu' ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 31 buwan, 110 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 85% kyan ku 93 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 15% kyan ku 17 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 76%, Amis 6%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. maki qu ngasal bziran. tay 'llaw na Kawbu' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Kawbu' hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Kawbu' hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Kawbu' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Kawbu' hya' ga Rangay. tay mkyahu' na Kawbu' hya' ga Khpan.

alang Kawbo' ga niya mki sko Toweng si ato Hosing Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 31 bowan, 110 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 85% kyan ko 93 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 15% kyan ko 17 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 76%, Amis 6%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. maki qo ngasal bziran. tay 'llaw na Kawbo' hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Kawbo' hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Kawbo' hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Kawbo' hya' ga rgyax kraho'. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Kawbo' hya' ga Rangay. tay mkyaho' na Kawbo' hya' ga Khpan.
